name: muttzilla
short_description: muttzilla is a library which takes advantage of Netscape's Third Party Mail and News API. This allows use of your favorite e-mail and news clients instead of Netscape Messenger for handling mailto: and news: urls, "Send Link", and other e-mail functions.
